content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Line at position(x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two furnaces at (x=1.0, y=1.0) and (x=3.0, y=1.0)
- Two burner inserters at (x=1.5, y=2.5) and (x=3.5, y=2.5)
- Two wooden chests containing iron plates at (x=1.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5)

###Copper Plate Production Line at position(x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two furnaces at (x=2.0, y=7.0) and (x=4.0, y=7.0)
- Two burner inserters at (x=2.5, y=8.5) and (x=4.5, y=8.5)
- Two wooden chests at (x=2.5, y=9.5) and (x=4.5, y=9.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (x=3.5, y=9.5) moving items between chests

###Copper Cable Assembly Line at position(x=14.5, y=14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (x=14.5, y=14.5)
- Input chest at (x=14.5, y=11.5)
- Output chest at (x=11.5, y=14.5) containing copper cables
- Burner inserters at (x=14.5, y=12.5) and (x=12.5, y=14.5) for material movement

###Electronic Circuit Assembly Line at position(x=21.5, y=15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (x=21.5, y=15.5)
- Input chest at (x=21.5, y=12.5)
- Burner inserter at (x=21.5, y=13.5)

###Power Generation System at position(x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (x=2.5, y=35.5)
- Boiler at (x=7.0, y=35.5)
- Steam engine at (x=13.5, y=35.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
- Currently working and generating power

###Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities:
- Belt system connecting copper plate production to assembly machines
- Various interconnected belt groups for material transport between production areas

###Power Distribution
Electricity network (id=20276) connecting various electrical entities through multiple electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep boilers fueled at all times to maintain continuous power generation
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters to prevent work interruptions

### Resource Supply Issues
- Ensure assembly machines have consistent supply of required materials
- Set up proper logistics to prevent "ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE" status
- Maintain proper input/output connections for all production machines

### Connection Issues
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pumps and other fluid-handling entities
- Verify all power poles are properly connected to maintain electrical network integrity

### Inventory Management
- Monitor chest capacities to prevent overflow situations
- Ensure proper item movement between production stages
